text: Edzard Hans Wilhelm Reuter (16 February 1928 - 27 October 2024) was a German businessman. He served as the CEO of Daimler-Benz from 1987 to 1995. Reuter was born in Berlin, then-Weimar Republic. His father was Berlin Mayor Ernst Reuter. Reuter died on 27 October 2024 in Stuttgart, Germany at the age of 96.Former Daimler CEO Edzard Reuter is dead ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2024 deaths Category:German businesspeople Category:People from Berlin
title: Edzard Reuter
